title: IRACplus Document
description: Schema for representing a legal analysis document structured according to the IRACplus method.

issue.description: The legal issue framed in structural terms.

rule.description: The applicable rule(s), including statutory authority and normative content.

analysis.description: The analysis applying the rule to the facts, checking each MLC link and discussing contradictions.

conclusion.description: The conclusion on whether the legal effect exists and what structural failures, if any, prevent it.
